Growing Up NYC
  • Patterns

Share

The share component lets visitors share a specific page they are browsing. The sharing happens by texting the page's link to the phone number provided.

Read it later! Text yourself the link to this page.

Message Sent

      class="icon--large">

      <use xlink:href="#icon-check-outlined"></use>
    </svg></div>
  <p class="c-tip__content">Read it later! Text yourself the link to this page.
  </p>
  <div class="sms-form-wrapper share-form" id="share-by-text">

        value="sms_gunyc_send" /><input name="sharetext" type="hidden"
        value="sharetext" /><input name="postid" type="hidden"
        value="20313" /><input name="template" type="hidden"
        value="growingupnyc-brain-building-tip" /><input name="lang"

              data-content="Phone Number">Phone Number</span></label><input
